name: CEO of bad games
description:
Thanks for playing "CEO of bad games", made for Vimjam 2. The main theme was "boss", along with the idea of "on the edge".

 In it's current state, there isn't really a game loop. There is no win or loss condition. But you can stay around for maximum stonks!

Hover over each button for more information.

The game is a basic clicker game concept. Didn't have time or energy to make much of the game itself due to falling ill at the start of the jam. I decided to have a little fun on the music and the "poster art" instead, all of which I made myself.

Made in Godot, and features the classic Godot audio problems when uploaded to itch.
